sub_fields.label: Content Basic Optional Image
sub_fields.name: content_basic_optional_image
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to include an image?

sub_fields.label: Content Basic Image
sub_fields.name: content_basic_image
sub_fields.instructions: Size 576px by 576px (Aspect ratio 1:1 ) when aligned left or right OR size 1920px by 1080px (Aspect ratio 16:9) when aligned content wide.

sub_fields.label: Cards Image Border
sub_fields.name: cards_image_border
sub_fields.instructions: Select to add a border to the image

sub_fields.label: Services Image Border
sub_fields.name: services_image_border
sub_fields.instructions: Select to add a border to the image

sub_fields.label: Team Image Border
sub_fields.name: team_image_border
sub_fields.instructions: Select to add a border to the image

sub_fields.label: Spacer Height
sub_fields.name: spacer_height
sub_fields.instructions: Add space between blocks and customise its height.

sub_fields.label: Cards H Type of Link
sub_fields.name: cards_h_type_of_link
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether to open a modal window with extended content or create a button with a standard link.

choices.modal: Open a modal window with extended content

sub_fields.label: Cards H Button Title
sub_fields.name: cards_h_button_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title to the button that opens the modal window.

sub_fields.label: Posterimage
sub_fields.name: posterimage
sub_fields.instructions: Poster image only for MP4 Videos. Size 1280px * 720px if the video is 16:9, otherwise proportional to the uploaded video.
